### EA003-241002 Firewall Repair Project - Newfoundland and Labrador
#### Solicitation Details
* **Contract Title**: EA003-241002 Firewall Repair - NAFC St. John's, NL
* **Reference Number**: WS4365368366-Doc4365421417
* **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)
* **Original Posting Date**: 2023-12-21
* **Closing Date**: 2024-01-11T14:00:00

#### Project Overview
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWC) is issuing a tender for the repair and maintenance of firewalls at the North Atlantic Fisheries Centre in St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador. 

#### Tender Requirements
The scope of work involves the provision of labor and equipment necessary for repairing and maintaining the firewalls. The estimated value of this opportunity is between $100,001 and $500,000 CAD. 

#### Deliverables and Timeline
Project delivery requires successful contractors to complete work within 24 weeks of contract award.

#### Bid Requirements
Tenderers must submit a bid that includes a bid security document for Phase 2 of the bidding process.

#### Contracting Details
The successful contractor will be required to deliver construction and maintenance services in Newfoundland and Labrador.

#### Notice of Contact
Any administrative questions or requests for additional information can be directed to Adam Beaumaster at adam.beaumaster@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including bid forms, can be downloaded from the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18345270?extsite=MTgzNDUyNzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Special Considerations
Please note the disclaimer: Tenders are only accepted electronically through the link provided above. Tenders will not be accepted by email or mail.
